cab.content: document IstheJ^egCl-SlBritannic M Mgsty^s government military Secret.107079% /J[[From Viceroy, Army Department, to Secretary of Stale for India,4th September 1919.(Received 5th.)12065. 4th September. Malleson wires 3rd September, repeated Tehran : " Fact that Shah went to Constantinople in British war ship and was last heard of at Prinkipo has been seized on by Kazim Beg, who published widely that we have interned Shah for life at preliminary to annexing Persia. lie argues that to save Persia from falling into our hands, all good Mahometans should at once occupy any adjacent parts of: Persia and so preserve them for Islam."if
